question: The "Seven Rila Lakes" is located in which nation?
explanation: Rila National Park is the largest national park of Bulgaria, located in Rila Mountain Ranges. This national park houses the "Seven Rila Lakes" a group of seven glacial lakes. These lakes are Salzate, Okoto, Babreka, Bliznaka, Trilistnika, Ribnoto Ezero, Dolnoto Ezero. All these lakes flow out to form Dzherman River. It is one of the famous tourist attraction Of Bulgaria.
